project_snapshot_md:
# MOVA Skills Lab — Project Snapshot (2025-12-09, after L2_03 manufacturer↔verifier workflow)

## 1. Overview
State after adding a lab-level manufacturer→export→verifier workflow example using existing envelopes (env.dpp_passport_read_v1 and env.dpp_export_v1). Core remains MOVA 4.0.0; spec/mova-4.1.0-draft is reference only. Branch: feature/dpp-base-pack-v0.1.

## 2. Structure (short)
```
mova_skills_lab/
├── core/mova/{00_MANIFEST.json, ds/, env/, episodes/, global/, specs/}
├── docs/{... , PROJECT_MEMORY/...}
├── lab/{env/, examples/, schemas/, skill_runs/, tools/}
├── skills/{... , mova_check_basic, repo_snapshot_basic}
├── spec/mova-4.1.0-draft/{docs/, examples/, schemas/, tools/}
└── package.json, package-lock.json
```

## 3. New in DPP (L2_03)
- Added lab workflow example `dpp_workflow_L2_03_manufacturer_verifier_example.json` linking manufacturer read → export (GS1 EPCIS) → verifier read.
- Added optional documentation `docs/DPP_WORKFLOW_MANUFACTURER_VERIFIER_L2_03.md` describing the three steps and envelope references.

## 4. Notes
- Workflow is lab-level; execution is handled by external services using the referenced envelopes.
- Uses existing passport read/export envelopes from L2_01/L2_02.
